article.quote: This Morty has never much cared for his appearance.
article.title: Scruffy Morty

article.quote: This Morty used to get beaten up every day on his way to school. He decided to take self-defense classes to boost his confidence and physical strength.
article.title: Self Defense Morty

article.quote: This Morty is working for free for Jerry. He hopes to never see another apple in his life.
article.title: Ad Space Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty works in a very trendy part of town. On Fridays, he enjoys a nice burrito.
article.title: Beard Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty doesn't care what you think of him. He already knows he's got swag.
article.title: Hipster Morty

article.quote: This Morty has been corrupted by the power he feels in his arms and legs, he will show you no mercy if you do not follow the way of the fist. There is no fear in his Dojo or his heart.
article.title: No Mercy Morty

article.quote: This Morty is a dedicated practitioner of karate spending 12 hours a day working on his forms, sparring, and strength training. This Morty loves karate more than life.
article.title: Karate Morty

article.quote: This Morty will take any opportunity to display his fine facial hair, and has even won trophies for it.
article.title: Mustache Morty

article.quote: This Morty is not ashamed to promote other Rick and Morty games. Y'know, like Jerry's Game. You should download Jerry's Game, by the way.
article.title: Jerry's Game Morty

article.quote: This Morty was the second successful result in a series of experiments that led to the downfall and financial ruin of his creator. This Morty can only feel pain and hunger
article.title: Test X46 Morty

article.quote: This Morty is the result of a transdimensional pharmaceutical conglomerate's further experimentation on a patented genome acquired through a hostile takeover
article.title: Test X72 Morty

article.quote: This Morty has seen everything but has yet to feel the warmth of a loving touch.
article.title: Three Eye Morty

article.quote: This Morty has never felt accepted among the other Mortys. He hopes that they will one day see things the way he does.
article.title: One Eye Morty

article.quote: This Morty refuses to talk about his impairment, but some say he lost his eyes when his Rick tried to swap them out for his own.
article.title: No Eye Morty

article.quote: This Morty is an evil cosplayer from a dimension where Halloween is 340 days long. His rabbit costume used to be pink and cute, but has since faded to a dull gray from overuse.
article.title: Evil Rabbit Morty

article.quote: This Morty was the first result in a series of experiments performed by a guilt-ridden Rick who spent his dying days trying to bring back his lost grandson.
article.title: Test X1 Morty

article.quote: I'm more than just a hammer!
article.title: Hammerhead Morty

article.quote: This Morty works out once a week and likes to show off. He has yet to discover deodorant.
article.title: Tank Top Morty

article.quote: This Morty lurks in the trees to hide from trainers, but will attack if they enter his territory. The distant memories of his previous life fade a little more each day...
article.title: Wild Man Morty

article.quote: This Morty adapted to the harsh conditions after the Mortyland Uprising, scavenging anything he could use to keep himself alive.
article.title: Survivalist Morty

article.quote: This Morty survived the original Mortyland Uprising by hiding under a pile of soiled merchandise in a gift shop. He remembers the happier times.
article.title: Survivor Morty

article.quote: This ol’ Morty can’t be beat in the skys. Even when drawing crabs this old chap can be seen zigzagging around every archie and never pipped, not even once what what!
article.title: Ace Pilot Morty

article.quote: This mythical Morty appears every time a tear drop reaches the ocean. He is said to shimmer like the moonlight reflected in a still pool.
article.title: Prancer Morty

article.quote: This mythical Morty is said to appear near the homes of the recently deceased and can only be seen by labradors and people with peanut allergies.
article.title: Volcan Morty

article.quote: This mythical Morty can be found nesting in the Mortian Forest near Morty City. His tail feathers are said to smell like teenage shame.
article.title: Birdosaur Morty

article.quote: There is Morty, that is him, and his old man, that is Rick and the two would traverse the ol' interdimensionals together until alas brothers, a mishap put a right end to all that tomfoolery.
article.title: Violent Morty

article.quote: This Morty runs a small business and spends most of his time traveling the country. The way he sees it, only through total failure lies the true path to success.
article.title: Dangerous Morty

article.quote: This Morty spends his days in his small dirty apartment training for that one big moment to put the world right. He enjoys going to the cinema by himself.
article.title: Loner Morty

article.quote: This Morty wants to be a rainbow and can be seen standing on the edge of high buildings after the rain.
article.title: Rainbow Suit Morty

article.quote: This Morty uses his whole body to help large game studios create animations for match 3 games.
article.title: Motion Capture Morty

article.quote: This Morty enjoys wandering the local park naked but didn’t want the coming winter to effect his lifestyle choice.
article.title: Skin Suit Morty

article.quote: This successful Morty lent his name to an animation studio, only to be horrified by the content they produce.
article.title: Head Chef Morty

article.quote: This Morty’s intense chef training has left him unable to speak. He can only express his emotions through interpretive baking.
article.title: Pastry Chef Morty

article.quote: This Morty is responsible for washing dishes, taking out the trash, and changing the fryer grease. He smells like french fries and sweat.
article.title: Kitchen Boy Morty

article.quote: This Morty was found by Beth and Jerry among the possessions of their deceased Rick. Unable to find the right words, they decided to raise him as Morty's twin.
article.title: Poorly Cloned Morty

article.quote: This Morty is getting too old for this. It's his last day on the job, he’s past the point of no return, and he won't stop until his target is behind bars.
article.title: Hardboiled Morty

article.quote: This Morty’s peptic ulcer burns from all those coffee-soaked nights spent investigating a quintuple Mortycide that still haunts his every waking hour.
article.title: Detective Morty

article.quote: This Morty’s first day on the beat has been complicated. His fellow Cop Mortys questioned his loyalty after opting out of the protection racket run by the precinct’s Rick.
article.title: Rookie Morty

article.quote: This Morty grows out of the ground below the recently hanged and is said to induce madness in anyone who licks him. His scream can only be heard by unsuspecting dogs.
article.title: Seedling Morty

article.quote: This Morty spends all his time standing in the forest clearing by the light of the full moon, waiting for the chance to see his mother's shade pass by through the trees.
article.title: Fawn Morty

article.quote: This Morty has a terrible secret and would be devastated if anyone ever found out.
article.title: Cup Morty

article.quote: Two's a company, three's a crowd. This Morty likes denim three times more than a regular Morty.
article.title: Triple Denim Morty

article.quote: This Morty dares, dares to double... the denim.
article.title: Double Denim Morty

article.quote: This Morty likes short shorts. So much so that he never takes them off, even in the shower.
article.title: Denim Shorts Morty

article.quote: This Morty is the oldest and most highly ranked of all Morty vampires. Despite this, the other vampires joke that his ears allow interdimensional hearing even though he is completely deaf.
article.title: Old One Morty

article.quote: This Morty gave up drinking human blood in the late 50s and is now a children's entertainer/scarer.
article.title: Count Morty

article.quote: This Morty read too many teenage novels and believed that becoming a vampire would make him more attractive to the opposite sex. Everyone he loved died long ago.
article.title: New Blood Morty

article.quote: This Morty sleeps on the beach during the day and works as a dancer in a famous 80s night club. His signature dance move is The Lollipop.
article.title: Miami Morty

article.quote: This notorious Morty is the captain of a large vessel named Jessica's Pearl and once traded his eye for a barrel of gun powder infused rum.
article.title: Cap'n Morty

article.quote: This Morty once found a treasure chest of gold in the Caribbean but was tricked into trading it for a date with mermaid, who turned out to be a reverse mermaid.
article.title: Swashbuckle Morty

article.quote: This Morty is the son of the famous pirate 'Titanic Jerry', who was responsible for one of the worst pirate ship incidents in recorded history. Cabin Boy Morty is not trusted to be lookout.
article.title: Cabin Boy Morty

article.quote: This Morty was tired of always being told he was an idiot and would never have even half the brain power that his Rick possessed.
article.title: Rick Morty

article.quote: This Morty never recovered from his mother leaving the family when he was young. He decided to do the only thing in his power to bring her back.
article.title: Beth Morty

article.quote: This Morty had a difficult life growing up and never knew his real father until he discovered an old photo album hidden among his mother's posessions.
article.title: Jerry Morty

article.quote: This Morty discovered that his Rick erased all his memories of having an older sister to “keep him from pain”. He now tries to keep her alive in his heart.
article.title: Summer Morty

article.quote: This Morty has been wearing the same cheap, ill-fitting devil costume since last halloween.
article.title: Sexy Devil Morty

article.quote: TThis Morty spends his days hoping his dog doesn’t realize he's human. His favorite food is marrowbone jelly.
article.title: Exoskeleton Morty

article.quote: This Morty has spent most of his life in the Jerry World theme park. He was raised by the Jerrys that work there after being accidentally abandoned by his Rick.
article.title: Jerry Fan Morty

article.quote: In a world where muscular Mortys are coming, and they're coming strong, no Morty is safe from the power of Turbulent Juice Morty. 'Cuz he's gonna take CARE of it.
article.title: Turbulent Juice Morty

article.quote: This Morty loves the giant head in the sky. Look, see? He’s wearing the hat and everything.
article.title: Headism Morty

article.quote: This Morty has gone Morty-crazy from years of pointless fighting in the Grand Inter-dimensional Morty War. He witnessed many terrible things during this time.
article.title: Renegade Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension locked deep within the Grand Inter-dimensional Morty War. He’s having a hard time forgiving himself for the things he was ordered to do to his fellow Mortys.
article.title: Shell Shocked Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from one in a string of related dimension where all Ricks are required to submit their Mortys to fight in Grand Inter-dimensional Morty War.
article.title: Boot Camp Morty

article.quote: This Morty is cursed to spend his final days as a werewolf, tormented by the terrible things he has done. But hey, on the plus side, he does have a beautiful, shiny coat.
article.title: Werewolf Morty

article.quote: This Morty has the appearance of a dog and spends his evenings howling at the moon and... well, being a dog.
article.title: Dog Morty

article.quote: This Morty was bitten by a small dog while on a backpacking trip.
article.title: Dog Bite Morty

article.quote: This Morty’s Rick had a crazy idea to start a theme park inhabited solely by human-dino hybrids. He ended up financially and emotionally ruined due to lack of interest.
article.title: Raptor Morty

article.quote: This Morty has cold blood, saving his Rick 38% in heating costs per year.
article.title: Reptile Morty

article.quote: Rick found this Morty partially lodged inside of his experimental Medusa Device.
article.title: Boulder Morty

article.quote: This Morty was fully aware of the risks involved from excessive skin contact with Rick’s Medusa Device but decided the benefits outweighed the negative effects.
article.title: Petrified Morty

article.quote: This Morty unfortunately mistook his Rick’s "Medusa Device" for a novelty item and was unaware of the side effects from excessive skin contact.
article.title: Stoned Morty

article.quote: This Morty has committed several unspeakable crimes while dressed as a banana. No one has seen or heard from his Rick in three years.
article.title: Banana Morty

article.quote: This Morty broke away from his tour group and sampled some experimental orange candy from the off-limits research lab of his Rick’s factory complex.
article.title: Orange Morty

article.quote: This Morty was framed by his Rick for multi-dimensional omnicide and has since built a new life for himself by hiding among the strawberry people of Fragaria-Prime.
article.title: Strawberry Morty

article.quote: This Morty smells like sour milk and emits deadly spores every evening, just before sunset. There is nothing left of who he used to be.
article.title: Host Morty

article.quote: This Morty surprised his family by turning up at home one day after his funeral. Unsure of the best course of action, his family kept him chained up in the back yard.
article.title: Parasitic Morty

article.quote: This Morty hasn’t felt right since using the public restroom of a re-fermented burger joint on a small planetoid in the inner asteroid belt of the Epsilon Eridani system.
article.title: Infected Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where all the cells in his body have merged into one. He is soft and sticky to the touch and warm inside.
article.title: Blob Morty

article.quote: This Morty is made of goo and smells like warm saline solution, body spray and shame.
article.title: Goo Morty

article.quote: This Morty is a big fan of Grandpa Rick and is a fully paid member of the Rick Fan Club - a scam run by a desperate Rick who needs the money.
article.title: Super Rick Fan Morty

article.quote: This Morty loves Mortys so much that his family had to stage an intervention to discuss his narcissistic addiction.
article.title: Super Morty Fan Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where Earth developed as the fourth planet from the sun after Theia settled in a stable orbit.
article.title: Triple Snoozle Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where the early planetoid Theia crashed into Venus instead of what would have later become Earth.
article.title: Double Snoozle Morty

article.quote: This Morty's heart dissolved long ago into the clear, pink jelly that makes up his current form. He stains anything he touches.
article.title: Jelly Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where Venus never formed, making Earth the second planet from the sun.
article.title: Single Snoozle Morty

article.quote: This Morty is full of wonders that are waiting just beyond his event horizon to be exposed from the darkness that hides them...
article.title: Black Hole Morty

article.quote: This Morty has a small role as the Sun in a local amateur drama production. It would mean the world to him if his Rick could attend on opening night. His Rick is planning to stay at home.
article.title: Sun Morty

article.quote: This Morty worships the Moon and is planning a fantastical expedition to find the hidden gallery-tomb and the portrait it contains that will confirm his beliefs. His Rick has refused to help.
article.title: Moon Morty

article.quote: This Morty took the full force of a rainbow laser blast to the heart from a Rick who was jealous of his beauty. Healed by the Unicorns of Crystal Forest, he now possesses their powers.
article.title: Super Unicorn Morty

article.quote: This Morty is a beautiful and majestic unicorn and would prefer to be known by his unicorn name, 'Stardust Harmony'.
article.title: Unicorn Morty

article.quote: This Morty believes in unicorns and will one day find a unicorn to call his own. Only then will his nightmares stop.
article.title: Unicorn Chaser Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where all life is comprised of living slices of pizza. He has recently contracted a nasty case of pepperoni after sharing an unprotected oven.
article.title: Pepperoni Pizza Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where all life is comprised of living slices of pizza. Mushrooms are the latest fashion trend.
article.title: Mushroom Pizza Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where all life is comprised of living slices of pizza.
article.title: Pizza Morty

article.quote: This Morty never fully recovered from the nuclear waste his Rick tried to feed him. His tongue will make your skin tingle if it touches you.
article.title: Big Tongue Morty

article.quote: This Morty has had enough of society's rules and will no longer take the weight of The Man pushing him down.
article.title: Punk Morty

article.quote: This Morty failed to become a beautiful butterfly. In fact, he has lost most of his motor skills and can no longer communicate.
article.title: Butterfly Morty

article.quote: This Morty is covered in a hard, silk shell. When he emerges, he hopes to be a beautiful butterfly.
article.title: Cocoon Morty

article.quote: This Morty tried having his eyes "shined" to allow him to see in the dark. It didn't work so his Rick just replaced his eyes with diamonds.
article.title: Diamond Eyes Morty

article.quote: This Morty became terribly ill after Jerry tried to make dinner for him. Jerry used one of Rick's inventions to teleport him away so no one would find out.
article.title: Mutant Flu Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where they haven't invented vaccines. This Morty is meant to return home with a cure for the common cold.
article.title: Flu Morty

article.quote: This Morty had a terrible accident in a cryogenics lab while trying to save his Rick from a life-threatening disease.
article.title: Frozen Morty

article.quote: This Morty is always too cold. He likes warm cups of cocoa and appreciates a comforter with a tog rating of at least 13.5.
article.title: Cold Morty

article.quote: This Morty was exposed to a large dose of cosmic radiation after his Rick abandoned him in deep space.
article.title: Flaming Morty

article.quote: This Morty is always too warm. He likes strawberry ice cream and a cool summer breeze.
article.title: Hot Morty

article.quote: This Morty is under a witch's spell-- one that can only be broken by a kiss from a handsome prince.
article.title: Asleep Morty

article.quote: This Morty is lucky to get even two hours of sleep at night. He suffers from night terrors that developed after he saw his own Rick get turned inside out.
article.title: Sleepy Morty

article.quote: This Morty has missed a lot of school thanks to his Rick's crazy adventures. He is now looking at a C- in Math.
article.title: Tired Morty

article.quote: This Morty spends most of his day tending to his hair. He is fully aware that it's the only thing he has going for him.
article.title: Afro Morty

article.quote: This Morty is a fan of 80's cop dramas. He hopes to one day find a dimension where crime doesn't pay.
article.title: Chops Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty was the first in his dimension to grow a mullet. He was quickly banished to another dimension and told not to return.
article.title: Mullet Morty

article.quote: This Morty works out once a week and likes to show off. He has yet to discover deodorant.
article.title: Tank Top Morty

article.quote: This Morty likes to wear low-cut tops. He feels that his v-neck gives him an air of superiority over other Mortys.
article.title: V Neck Morty

article.quote: This egg appears to contain a life force.
article.title: Egg Morty

article.quote: This Morty can often be seen hyping up the crowd.
article.title: Mascot Morty

article.quote: This article is about Cronenberg Morty. You may be looking for
article.title: Cronenberg Morty

article.quote: This Morty lives a life of strict rules and 5:00am wake-up calls. He dreams of one day leaving this life behind and living in the country with a cow named Daisy.
article.title: Guard Morty

article.quote: This article is about the minor character from "
article.title: Robot Morty

article.quote: This article is about Cowboy Morty. You may be looking for
article.title: Cowboy Morty

article.quote: This Morty comes from a tiny world created by another Rick. His tiny world was destroyed when that Rick mistook it for a pizza slice. This Morty wants vengeance for the loss of his people.
article.title: Mini Morty

article.quote: This Morty was extradited from his home world after he caused a nuclear silo to explode.
article.title: Cyclops Morty

article.quote: This Morty comes from a family of fish people. He is a vegan but enjoys chicken on Fridays.
article.title: Aqua Morty

article.quote: This Morty has lost his true form. He wanders around aimlessly in search of himself, unaware that his body was buried many years ago.
article.title: Shadow Morty

article.quote: This Morty fell into a meat processing machine during a field trip to the sausage factory. He hasn't felt the same since then.
article.title: Sausage Morty

article.quote: This Morty is from a dimension where it's possible to have really, REALLY bad gas.
article.title: Gaseous Morty

article.quote: This Morty is never late for a meeting but has never made it home in time for his son's birthday party. He's hoping for a promotion.
article.title: Business Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty is an experiment gone wrong. His Rick was driven mad by the allure of mythical Mermaid Morty and wanted his own.
article.title: Reverse Mermaid Morty

article.quote: This Morty is sometimes thought to be a myth. He sits on rocks and lures fishermen to their doom.
article.title: Mermaid Morty

article.quote: This Morty feels more at home in the water. He can hold his breath underwater for 3 minutes and 37 seconds.
article.title: Swimmer Morty

article.quote: This Morty has been seen moving whole planets with his mind. He can also make a cheese sandwich without touching the bread.
article.title: Psychokinetic Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty was expelled from school when he accidentally crushed his teacher after concentrating on a math problem too hard.
article.title: Telekinetic Morty

article.quote: This Morty woke up with a bad headache and a scar on his head. He is convinced he saw Rick leaving his room.
article.title: Telepathic Morty

article.quote: This Morty enjoys role playing. He uses it as an escape from the real world where he can be a powerful wizard and rule entire lands.
article.title: Wizard Morty

article.quote: This Morty claims he can read minds. He says he uncovered his Rick's dark secrets and turned him in to the Council of Ricks.
article.title: Mystic Morty

article.quote: This Morty is deceitful. He lied on his exam paper and said he finished his vegetables when he actually did not.
article.title: Magic Morty

article.quote: This Morty asked his Rick to help him with his Halloween costume. He's regretted it ever since.
article.title: Skeleton Morty

article.quote: This Morty asked his Rick to create a powerful spot removal cream for his acne but has regretted it ever since.
article.title: No Skin Morty

article.quote: This Morty asked his Rick for help in his biology class. He's regretted it ever since.
article.title: Veiny Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty can cut a promo like the best of them. But he was forced to retire after a botched suplex from the top rop broke his neck.
article.title: Wrestler Morty

article.quote: This Morty doesn't know when enough is enough. He plays ruff and wont take no for an answer.
article.title: Buff Morty

article.quote: This Morty has found friendship in his feline companions. He now struggles to socialise with humans.
article.title: Crazy Cat Morty

article.quote: This Morty has adopted two cats. He is unaware that they are actually alien parasites trying to control his mind
article.title: Two Cat Morty

article.quote: This Morty believes his Rick is trapped inside the mind of a cat. (His Rick is actually winning an inter-dimensional game of hide and seek.)
article.title: Stray Cat Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty was born to be wild, a son of the open road, a life of hard living and a hard women with his back to the wind and grit in his teeth, forever riding into the desert sun.
article.title: Biker Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty was the leader of the pack, rebelling against whatever you've got. He lost everything in a grease fire and had to sell his bike to keep himself in leathers.
article.title: Greaser Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty was caught in the shockwave caused by the last 2 Mortys interference with the Morty Multiplication generator and is forever stuck in a 5 dimensional Morty Multiplication feedback loop.
article.title: Multi Morty

article.quote: This Morty made the mistake of looking into a mirror while touching the supercooled outer casing of the Morty Multiplication Generator that his Rick created.
article.title: Triple Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty made the mistake of holding a penny while standing too close to the bio-magnetic field of the Morty Multiplication Generator that his Rick created.
article.title: Double Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty will visit you at 2 am in the morning if you leave this game running in front of a mirror in an empty room. Knock the door 3 times before going to sleep.
article.title: Phantom Morty

article.quote: This Morty regrets playing in toxic waste. His Rick has since disowned him and doesn't even write him letters anymore.
article.title: Colossal Head Morty

article.quote: This Morty has lost all sense of smell and feels no pain. His medical condition is not recognized amongst Ricks.
article.title: Giant Head Morty

article.quote: This Morty spends most of his time tied to a tree. He believes the leaves will cleanse the mistakes of his past.
article.title: Off The Grid Morty

article.quote: This Morty makes his own tie-dyed T-shirts and sells them at the local park.
article.title: Hippie Morty

article.quote: This Morty hopes to spread love throughout the world. He buys all his clothes from thrift shops.
article.title: Peace Morty

article.quote: This Morty floats over freshly dug graves and can be seen in south facing mirrors on full moon nights during the month of October.
article.title: Ghostly Morty (Pocket Mortys)

article.quote: This Morty hides in the cupboards of empty rooms and cuts holes in the family bed sheets. He is cold to the touch and can never return home again.
article.title: Spooky Morty

article.quote: This Morty decided to combine his fork, and spoon with his Ricks Combo-Ray.
article.title: Spork Morty

article.quote: This Morty got tired of his beloved spoon.
article.title: Fork Morty

article.quote: This Mortys only friend is his spoon.
article.title: Spoon Morty

article.quote: After evolving further this intergalactic Morty soon became the fearsome tyrant of his dimension. Having nightly rendezvous with the local ladies.
article.title: Exo-Prime Morty

article.quote: This mutated Morty has earned the respect of his peers, and is learning to lead a normal life.
article.title: Exo-Omega Morty

article.quote: This mutated Morty is a nobody in his dimension. He lives in the sewers, and has tea parties with rats.
article.title: Exo-Alpha Morty

article.quote: This Morty is the 1 of 2 where neither friends nor loving family may go, his eyes watching a thousand suns and a thousand moons rise and fall together a thousand times.
article.title: Rainbow Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty wears a purple shirt he was given when he attended a seminar on 'power dressing' a few months before the release of this game.
article.title: Purple Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty wears a shirt of the purest green that ever was seen in many a year around these parts, here to behold in all its glory!
article.title: Green Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty's shirt makes him look like a carrot to any rabbits that might be watching from nearby forests. Y'know, like rabbits do.
article.title: Orange Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty finds the color red powerful, just like the blood that runs through the veins of all Morty's who follow the "True Way of the Heart" on the path to their bliss.
article.title: Red Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty does not want to be defined by wearing the same yellow shirt every day, as other Mortys do. He opted for blue, the color of the summer sky and the distant seas.
article.title: Blue Shirt Morty

article.quote: This Morty feels a bit of self promotion could go a long way. He wants to share his love of this game with his friends.
article.title: Pocket Mortys Morty

article.quote: This Morty was bitten by a radioactive bunny, and now turns into a rabbit every time a carrot is near. Unfortunately, he is from a dimension where humans evolved from carrots.
article.title: Rabbit Morty

article.quote: This Morty chose poorly. Dried up and dead to the world, only hatred, cruel fate, and years of modern food preservatives keep his wicked heart beating.
article.title: Ancient Morty

article.quote: This Morty sits alone in his small room, looking through old photo albums at faces he can't quite remember. He waits for the comfort only the grave can bring.
article.title: Geriatric Morty

article.quote: This Morty remembers when this all used to be fields and he could fly his kite freely without the fear of it becoming stuck in a tree.
article.title: Old Morty

article.quote: This Morty Lurks around inner city parks waiting to touch unsupervised dogs without the owners consent.
article.title: Hobo Morty

article.quote: This Morty refuses to take a bath or brush his teeth. He also appreciates the health benefits of garlic.
article.title: Unkempt Morty
